content.en: Relay coordination optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the coordination of directional overcurrent relays in power distribution systems. They have been using various algorithms, such as genetic algorithms, hybrid genetic algorithms, evolutionary algorithms, and matheuristic algorithms, to optimize the coordination and achieve better performance. These algorithms help determine the optimum values of settings for the relays and solve the optimization problems involved in achieving coordination.
content.da: Optimering af relækoordination: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre koordineringen af retningsbestemte overstrømsrelæer i distributionssystemer. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer, hybride genetiske algoritmer, evolutionære algoritmer og matheuristiske algoritmer, for at optimere koordineringen og opnå bedre ydeevne. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at bestemme de optimale indstillinger for relæerne og løse de optimeringsproblemer, der er involveret i at opnå koordinering.
